text: Francis Augustin Bazire (born 17 April 1939) is a retired French cyclist. He won a silver medal in the amateur road race at the 1963 UCI Road World Championships. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and finished in 53rd place in the same event. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:French cyclists Category:Olympians for France Category:People from Seine-Maritime Category:Sportspeople from Normandy
title: Francis Bazire
